rules_text:
Whenever you cast Whint or a spell from your graveyard, tap target nonland permanent you don't control, put two stun counters on it.
Nonland permanent cards in your graveyard have escape, the escape cost is equal to that cards mana cost and exile three other cards from your graveyard.
Escape {U}{B}{R}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
